body_html:
@shihenw I did not have that issue at all. It worked out of the box for me.
The one time that I had a problem with the V100 was because I had upgraded to the wrong NVIDIA driver. Make sure you have a supported driver (seems that for the V100, 384.81 should be your driver version if you are up to date) http://www.nvidia.com/download/driverResults.aspx/124729/en-us
